title: Ep 464 | Missy Gives Jase a Silly New Nickname & Phil Uncovers Just How Ignorant Leaders Can Be
description:
Jase receives a new nickname from his wife, and Phil points out the ignorance of leaders who unknowingly fulfilled God's plan. Jase intercepts punishment for his brothers in stories from the past, and Phil expounds on how humanity justifies sin, yet contributed to the cross. Al makes three big points about believing, belonging, and behaving. And Willie's pond turns up a gargantuan fish!

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
